Posts.EditableText: I'm working on a new graphical text adventure game called Mutagenics. I've posted a brief video of part of the intro on YouTube that can be viewed at [url:1hhyo4zn]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=At8ObHaaxCI&feature=plcp[/url:1hhyo4zn].
